name: part_005
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC segment where Ouro Kronii, Hakos Baelz, and IRyS interact with the audience and mention the official hashtag.
The members explore the 'Promise Hideout' virtual set and IRyS introduces a variety game segment.
IRyS explains the rules of the 'Pleasure or Pain? Promise Foot Massage Karaoke Battle'.
Introduction of the Foot Reflexology Mat and choosing the first player.
IRyS performs 'Zankyou Sanka' while walking on the reflexology mat.

subtitles.original: So far!
subtitles.english: So far!

subtitles.original: Are you guys having a good time?
subtitles.english: Are you guys having a good time?

subtitles.original: Don't forget to share your comments
subtitles.english: Don't forget to share your comments

subtitles.original: using the hashtag shown at the top right of the screen!
subtitles.english: using the hashtag shown at the top right of the screen!

subtitles.original: #Promise2U!
subtitles.english: #Promise2U!

subtitles.original: Alright, we're currently at the Promise Hideout!
subtitles.english: Alright, we're currently at the Promise Hideout!

subtitles.original: Over there!
subtitles.english: Over there!

subtitles.original: Oh my god, that is huge!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, that is huge!

subtitles.original: Oh my god, it's so pretty!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, it's so pretty!

subtitles.original: Whoa! I was way too excited!
subtitles.english: Whoa! I was way too excited!

subtitles.original: Don't die! Don't die!
subtitles.english: Don't die! Don't die!

subtitles.original: Now that we also have such a fancy stage
subtitles.english: Now that we also have such a fancy stage

subtitles.original: on the rooftop as well and everything,
subtitles.english: on the rooftop as well and everything,

subtitles.original: let's turn things up with some fun variety games!
subtitles.english: let's turn things up with some fun variety games!

subtitles.original: I bet you guys are probably feeling a bit tired
subtitles.english: I bet you guys are probably feeling a bit tired

subtitles.original: after that intense first half of this live, right?
subtitles.english: after that intense first half of this live, right?

subtitles.original: I'm good! I'm alive, upstanding!
subtitles.english: I'm good! I'm alive, upstanding!

subtitles.original: To help you recover from that fatigue and tiredness,
subtitles.english: To help you recover from that fatigue and tiredness,

subtitles.original: I've prepared the perfect segment for you guys!
subtitles.english: I've prepared the perfect segment for you guys!

subtitles.original: Pleasure or Pain? Promise Foot Massage Karaoke Battle!
subtitles.english: Pleasure or Pain? Promise Foot Massage Karaoke Battle!

subtitles.original: Pleasure or Pain? Promise Foot Massage Karaoke Battle
subtitles.english: Pleasure or Pain? Promise Foot Massage Karaoke Battle

subtitles.original: Each member will sing one chorus from two songs they're good at!
subtitles.english: Each member will sing one chorus from two songs they're good at!

subtitles.original: Battle it out by total score using the scoring system.
subtitles.english: Battle it out by total score using the scoring system.

subtitles.original: Foot pressure point massage while singing...
subtitles.english: Foot pressure point massage while singing...

subtitles.original: Can they hold out and finish the song?
subtitles.english: Can they hold out and finish the song?

subtitles.original: Place 2nd or lower and drink the super sour geki-suppa juice as punishment!
subtitles.english: Place 2nd or lower and drink the super sour geki-suppa juice as punishment!

subtitles.original: Ta-da! It's a foot reflexology mat!
subtitles.english: Ta-da! It's a foot reflexology mat!

subtitles.original: First Half: Foot Reflexology Mat
subtitles.english: First Half: Foot Reflexology Mat

subtitles.original: So, who's brave enough to go first?
subtitles.english: So, who's brave enough to go first?

subtitles.original: Fine, I'll go first!
subtitles.english: Fine, I'll go first!

subtitles.original: I am going to sing "Zankyou Sanka"!
subtitles.english: I am going to sing "Zankyou Sanka"!

subtitles.original: Aah! Ooh!
subtitles.english: Aah! Ooh!

subtitles.original: Oh! Ouch! She's fine!
subtitles.english: Oh! Ouch! She's fine!

subtitles.original: Aah! Oh my god! Keep walking!
subtitles.english: Aah! Oh my god! Keep walking!

subtitles.original: Aah! Ouch! It hurts!
subtitles.english: Aah! Ouch! It hurts!

subtitles.original: 誰が袖に咲く幻花
subtitles.english: Who is the phantom flower blooming on their sleeve?

subtitles.original: ただそこに藍を落とした
subtitles.english: Just dropping indigo there.

subtitles.original: 派手に色を溶かす夜に
subtitles.english: In a night that flamboyantly dissolves colors.

subtitles.original: 銀朱の月を添えて
subtitles.english: Accompanied by a vermillion moon.

subtitles.original: 転がるように風を切って
subtitles.english: Cutting through the wind as if rolling.

subtitles.original: 躓くごとに強くなった
subtitles.english: Strengthened by every stumble.

subtitles.original: 光も痛みも怒りも全部
subtitles.english: Embracing all the light, pain, and anger.

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embrace it all!

subtitles.original: 選ばれなければ　選べばいい
subtitles.english: If you aren't chosen, then just choose for yourself.

subtitles.original: 声よ轟け　夜のその向こうへ
subtitles.english: Let your voice roar, to the other side of the night.

subtitles.original: 涙で滲んでた
subtitles.english: Blurred by tears,

subtitles.original: あんなに遠くの景色まで
subtitles.english: even that distant landscape.

subtitles.original: 響き渡れ
subtitles.english: Resonate far and wide.

subtitles.original: 何を奏でて？　誰に届けたくて？
subtitles.english: What are you playing? Who do you want to reach?

subtitles.original: 不確かなままでいい
subtitles.english: It's okay to be uncertain.

subtitles.original: どんなに暗い感情も
subtitles.english: No matter how dark the feelings,

subtitles.original: どんなに長い葛藤も
subtitles.english: no matter how long the conflict,

subtitles.original: 歌と散れ　残響
subtitles.english: scatter with the song, reverberation!
